metadata.name: Tetrachromacy
metadata.description:
Tetrachromacy!
The loved item from the not so loved mod returns!
The item, Tetrachromacy, lets you shoot in all directions! While also adding a splash of color into the game!
The item is found in treasure and angel rooms, both in normal and greed mode.
Synergises with a buttload of items that include: Brimstone Technology The Ludovico Technique My Reflection Tiny Planet Mutant Spider 20/20 The Inner Eye and more!
So subscribe today!
EDIT: Front page! Thank you guys so much!
EDIT 2: Please help me get back on the showcase! Subscribe and rate!
EDIT 3: YOU GUYS ARE SO AMAZING! 3rd most popular mod this week! Thank you guys so much, and if you haven't yet, please subscribe and rate! Thank you!
EDIT 4: Thank you all so much! We were the number one mod for at least 48 hours! And we're still number two! Fixed a problem with brimstone and rubber cement where lasers would not go away.
